title.value: Сравнительный анализ материального стимулирования труда в системе менеджмента качества на уборке зерновых культур
Comparative analysis of material stimulation of labour in the system of quality management during grain crops harvesting

journal.title: Bulletin of the Belarussian State Agricultural Academy : the guidance journal

person.name: Shapovalova, M.N., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: One of the main tasks of organizations with different forms of ownership is the search of efficient methods of labour management, which ensure activization of human factor. Determining causal factor of high performance of employees is their motivation. The article examines conditions of material stimulation of workers employed for the harvesting of crops in agricultural organizations of the Republic of Belarus, Russian Federation and Ukraine.
